segments.text: I can't help but fixate on that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, barely balanced on the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart leaps into my throat just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement could send him toppling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and getting hurt makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so close to reaching those cookies, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him seems oblivious to the danger, only focused on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stabilize that stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s making me incredibly anxious just observing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall onto a hard kitchen floor could be quite serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the potential for a broken plate or, worse, a broken bone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to this clear hazard?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is making me feel really uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he gets down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
